reviews.review: I finally know that the cake is a lie. brilliant introduction to the series
Top Game :)

An actual masterpiece.
If you haven't experienced this game, you need to.

Прекрасная игра рассчитанная на логическое мышление, прошел на одном дыхании, постоянные подстебывания со стороны GlaDOS это что-то с чем-то также титры вообще отдельный респект. Из всего этого конечно-же постоянные загрузки вымораживают.

Buy this game

Why do you even need a review?
Portal is an awesome game with an amazing plot. Puzzles are challenging and thats what makes the game great.

What can I say aside from I love portal? It's a fun puzzle game with unique aspects to it and has a great sense of humor. Many of you may be wondering why buy the first portal when there is a second, but I must say although the second is a lot better you find the second SO much more enjoyable if you finish this one first.

If you want something that will make you think and make you laugh this is definitely a game you would love.
The cake is a lie.

Muy entretenido, un poco corto (la campaña/historia) pero es bastante bueno !!
100% recomendable, ha y si te pasaste la historia y tienes ganas de más ahi esta el modo de desafios tambien para gastar unas cuantas horas más !!
Muy bueno !!!

Portal is simply one of the best games of last generation, or might I say: innovative. Everything was perfect: the presentation, plot, gameplay, ending, etc. I might even say it is my favorite game of the last generation, but I still have to clear my backlog before I make that decision.

You are plopped into a testing facility and you have no clue what you are doing until you piece things together. There are no cutscenes and no other humans as you will find out. The "person" actively speaking throughout the stages makes you laugh and cringe sometimes within the same ten minute interval. With the hidden things you will probably find, you will realize that the situation at hand might not seem as okay as you once thought.

9.5/10

Portal was meant to be nothing more than a little puzzle bonus for those who bought The Orange Box, but easily turned out to be the best game in the bundle and an undeniable success. Humor and dialogue turn an ordinary puzzler into an extraordinary expereince.
muito louco mesmo
Freaking awesome!
Honestly, one of the greatest games ever to grace the home computer. I really wish that everybody could play it.
말이 필요없다. 그냥 최고다. 이야기를 진행하면 글라도스 저 녀석을 정말. 고물상에 팔아버리고 싶을 것이다.

This short game from The Orange Box is one that really changed the way you play video games. No weapons or combat, it's a different type of tempo that I really enjoyed playing. It's challenging to solve puzzles using physics and portals, and has a brilliant and hilarious storyline. It's innovative and packed full of science. There's really no other game that compares, except of course Portal 2.
Me ha encantado, me lo he pasado un par de veces, un poco corto pero muy original y entretenido.
It's a lot shorter than the second version.  Downloaded it overnight, woke up, and beat it in time for breakfast.

Thanks to a previous sale, I was able to buy this for the heck of it. Despite it being surprisingly short, I found it really enjoyable and liked some of the mental exercises some levels gave when the answer wasn't totally clear. .
Fun, clever, short and sweet.  Great!  Get it.
Great game.  Classic.  Highly recommend.
It's a good game but it's a little short. Portal 2 is this made even better.
This game is the best game ever made

Очень хорошая игра. 
Плавный переход от обучения к полноценному игровому процессу.
В определённых моментах стоит хорошенько подумать, что я считаю так называемой "фишечкой" Portal. 
Благодарю Гейба за скидку на Portal.
Excelente game
A great game for all ages that is awesome for both casual and hardcore gamers.
Cake is lie! :)
This creative strategy game allows players to go through intense and difficult test chambers to reach their goal.
This is a great game if you like puzzle rpgs.

Excelente jogo tipo puzzle, mas em 3D.
Esteticamente reservado mas com algum humor.
Amazing, must get, great talks with glados
Этой игре 7 лет, но почти все обладатели стима играют в неё снова и снова. Игра такого уровня не умрёт никогда 10/10
Kurz aber gut
Good game, a bit old now but still amazing story!
Good game, play before the second

Потрясающая игра. Интересные головоломки, отличная атмосфера, очень оригинальная. 
Единственный недостаток -- короткая. :)
The lies ;_;

Awesome Game! It's a FPS/Puzzle game that has a great story (On an FPS?! Yeah I know crazy right?), Awesome Characters, and crazy levels that will both challenge and entertain you. Only thing is it may get repetitive. I didn't think that but I can see that some people might think so. Overall definately worth atleast a try. 8/10

You shot something you go there. Thats about it
10/10 would shot something
This is Portal 2 Boot Camp, but still fun as fuk.

PORTAL - это моя первая игра-головоломка про порталы... Да что уж там, это первая игра в которой перемещения в пространстве при помощи порталов реализовано на высшем уровне! И неважно когда в нее играть, в далеком 2007, когда она только появилась, или в 2014, когда я приобрел ее цифровую копию на Steam. Она всегда будет радовать своим неординарным геймплеем. А тот, кто отважится заполучить все достижения в игре, по настоящему ощутит дух этого замечательного проекта...
Входит, выходит, замечательно выходит!
Muito interessante, você começa a jogar e não para ate zerar todos os desafios.
If you haven't played Portal we can't be friends anymore.
Trzeba dużo przy niej myśleć, ale ogólnie fajne. Moja ocena to 8/10. Kupujcie w promocji bo warto...
Пожалуй одна из самых лучших серий игр в целом, отличный сюжет, хорошее музыкальное и голосовое окружение и интересные испытания
отличная игра! все игры от valve офигенные
One of the greatest games of all time. I. Love. It.
If you haven't played this yet, there is something wrong with you.  It's a great game and will probably go on sale for dirt cheap before the end of the summer sale.

This is an absolutely amazing FPS problem solving concept that gripped me right from the beginning.

After having played this game for the first time on Xbox 360 I had to buy it for my PC with no regrets, I enjoyed it even more on the PC.

You get double your money’s worth if you decide to try to get all the Achievements, a must! 
I recommend the entire Portal series, Portal, Portal 2, Thinking with Time Machine (The cherry on the Cake, excuse the pun!)

Great puzzle game from Valve. Campaign is short (about 2h) and straightforward, good writing with some excellent dark humour. Glados is a top character. The main draw in the game is the replayability in trying to beat the test rooms again on the special objectives mode. 8/10.

Portal is that kind of game where the gameplay and the innovation matters above everything. Is a game that will make you think more the more you advance while having fun playing it. It is also a game with a story so unique.  Very few games provide this kind of experience so try it, you won't regret it at all and be careful with the CAKE!!!!!
Un classique ! A jouer absolument, très bon jeu de puzzle !
Es muy bueno, divertido, entretenido y chulo, pero algo corto para mi gusto
An instant classic. The cake at the end made it all worthwhile.
Классика. Интересные головоломки, великолепное исполнение игры.

Un gran juego con una maravillosa historia.
No tiene los mejores graficos, pero la historia, y algun que otro secreto del juego le dan mas nota, las pruebas son super entretenidas y variadas. Puedes pasarte el juego en unas 3 horas y te va a encantar, un precio justamente pagado.
No te sentirás triunfante al acabarlo, si no triste por haber acabado y saber que no volverá a ser lo mismo en Portal 2, grandioso juego. 9.5
Simply one of the best games ever made.
jogo muito legal e o final é fantastico...

Awesome game.
Still mechanically top-level :)
DER Klassiker! Einfach genial aufgebaut, durchdacht, mit der nötigen Prise Humor, atmosphärisch und sehr kurzweilig. Zusätzliche Herausforderungen sorgen für Langzeitspaß.
The gam is really good if you like puzzles and stuff.  The only negative i could think of is that sometimes i get dizzy if i play too long, but overall th game is great
This is a short but great game
Best game I ever played!
Ein absolutes muss für jeden der sich auch mal gerne durch Rätsel beist
Short fun game.

Un juego totalmente recomendado. La historia es algo linear, sin embargo, los puzzles que te trae este título lo compenza muy bien. Conforme se avanza, la dificultad aumenta y de igual manera la adicción al juego. Sin duda alguna, uno de los mejores juegos que he probado.

Portal is in its purest sense, a puzzle game that doesn't feel like a puzzle game. You don't feel like you're restricted by the gameplay and everything feels very fluid. I would definitely recommend this game to anyone that enjoys puzzle games, or just likes to test their creativity.
Excellent puzzles and a mysterious storyline. Perfect!

8/10

v gud wun.

Totally awesome game. Challenging and funny, with more puzzle than action. Definitely my sort of game! The main story was much shorter than expected – I thought the X/19 levels were tutorial, so I ended up beating the whole thing in one sitting when I was just trying to reach the main game before going to bed. I expect there will be plenty more play with the advanced levels and challenges.

Ciekawa, nie nudząca się, wymagająca myślenia i refleksu. Ciekawe początkowe wprowadzenie wciąga gracza. Początkowe poziomy są łatwe i wciagają tak że gdy napotkasz problem w nastepnych to grasz dalej aż skończysz. Wymaga też refleksu ruszania myszką i sprytu. Tajemniczość miejsca i nie których miejsc dodatkowych przyciąga. Może dzwięki i muzyka nie są mocną stroną tej gry ale z chęcia czekam na tańszą cene drugiej części. Polecam tą gre.

3D酔いしてめまいを感じるようなら、気絶してもかまいませんよ。
医療チームが来て、消化薬とアドレナリンで回復させてくれます。
ゲームをクリアしたら、ご褒美にケーキを差し上げます。 
しっとりとして絶品ですよ。

Um dos melhores jogos pra PC de todos os tempos, com uma mecânica simples e genial, a valve desenvolveu um jogo complexo e divertido, com uma boa história (além de ser muito sarcástico), os puzzles não são fáceis, mas não chega a ser irritante, Portal consegue pelo bom humor e ótima proposta, cativar o jogador de um jeito único.
Got bored very quickly

Fatnastico.

E' breve ma la "modalità sfida" offre un interessante e divertente modo per mettersi alla prova e allungare la longevità.

Inoltre stiamo parlando di una pietra migliare dei videogiochi, un piccolo gioiello che merita ogni centesimo che spenderete per acquistarlo.

Io avevo amato alla follia Portal 2, e anche se questo è assai più breve è un'esperienza ugualmente interessante.
Consigliatissimo.

P.S. scaricate la mod gratuita Rexaura, è fantastica! E' quasi un'espansione stand-alone, con una campagna completa, ben doppiata, con belle musiche e enigmi molto stimolanti.
A classic game that rarely gets old. It may be quick to beat, but it can provide endless entertainment.
Jogo muito legal, já zerei várias vezes!
I have preformed the party submission position many times.
没玩过的话一定要试试  非常独特的体验
If you like Portal 2, you'll like this. However, don't spend more than $5 on it because there's less than 3 hours of playtime in the main story.

Bastante bueno.Corto y con poca historia pero a la vez con puzles muy buenos y divertidos.
Posdata:gran fan de glados
Very fun, even though it is really short.
Meu celebro explodiu (recomendo)

Absolutly phenominal game. All the games I've played have fallen short to this hilareous, mind boggling,masterpiece. Will forever be a highlight in gaming because of its ingenuity and creativity. It has set the bar for all puzzle games. 5 stars all day, erray day.

I cannot stress how amazing this game is. No matter the cost, I'd recommend buying it. I don't care if you cannot afford food for the month, as long as you own this game. It's easily the most stimulating, creative and amusing game I have ever played, with the exception of Portal 2, which in some astonishingly shocking way managed to surpass even Portal.
I used to watch gameplay and trailers of this game, but never actually buying it until it came on sale. If I knew then what I was missing out on... I always longed for this game, thinking it looked amazing. It wasn't like that at all, it was better. So buy it, play it, play it some more, and for the love of everything holy, don't forget to buy Portal 2 when you're done.
Gran Innovador!!!
This is a nice game with a good amount of content that takes a short time to complete. I also like the challenge levels that are included.

J'ai commencé à jouer à Portal par le 2 et je dois dire que je ne suis pas du tout déçu de mettre m'y au premier. Un gameplay addictif, de beaux graphismes, des enigmes de plus en plus difficiles et tout cela argumenté par une pointe d'humour par les différents robots. Je conseille ce jeu à tous !
a real challenge to play while drinking
This game is probably one of the best games from Valve. This mind bending game will have you thinking with portals for hours. It is even fun after you complete it.
Wish I had played this a long time ago!
Love this game. So fun and thought provoking. Also hillarious.
Debes tenerlo si o si.

Saw my own ass with portals.

10/10
Très bon jeu qui fait chauffer les neurones ! Dommage qu'il soit si court et si facile... heureusement qu'il y a les salles bonus qui permettent de se creuser un peu plus la tête !
i make sure to beat this game at least 3 times a year

Portal is Portal and entirely awesome for being what it is: a physics, puzzle action game with a clever, witty sense of humor and enticing plot twists.

If you haven't bought Portal and Portal 2, you're seriously missing out on one of the best games out there.
Un gameplay unique et une ambiance géniale ! Un must have !
Portal is the perfect video game.  A wonderful combination of puzzle, action, strategy, and adventure.
